text.title: Host a Family Gathering
text.head: Host a Family Gathering
text.p: Family gatherings can be a chance for family members to reconnect and bond with each other . If you happen to be hosting one , here are some tips to help you plan and host a fun reunion of your immediate family .
text.head: Steps

list.item: Be precise but flexible when inviting family members . In too many situations , hosts can be overly unclear on arriving times , or they can be too strict . The best thing to do is create a window of time that is appropriate for a guest to arrive at your house .

Do n't make all the food yourself . Ask a person in each family unit to prepare a dish . If they are famous for a certain dish in your family , ask them to make that . Keep an even balance between appetizers , entrees , and desserts .
Decide what parts of your house are off-limits . Inform each person as they walk in your door , and if you feel the need , make signs and tape them to doors of off-limits areas .

Keep children in mind . Chances are that small children may be running around your house , and since the adults will most likely going to be occupied , leave out some child-friendly toys and activities in a common space , like a living room . These items could be :
Board games
Toy cars or blocks
Video games
Television ( block all inappropriate channels )

Privately tell an older child , minimum age 12 , that they need to keep an eye on younger kids . This will retain order in rooms where there is not constant adult supervision . You can include a small monetary incentive , like $ 2 per hour . Remind them not to be too “ bossy ” and to simply resolve small quarrels and retrieve adult help in case of problems on a bigger scale , like physical fighting or injuries . This also gives a preteen a sense of importance , which is always good .

Purchase assorted crackers , chips , cheeses and dips . Display them nicely on a coffee table or in a dining room . This can be a common space where all guests are allowed , which gives them an opportunity to converse and bond , which is the goal of your party .

Create an adult dinner table and a kid 's dinner table . Chances are that you will not have room for all family members to dine together in the same room , so the practical thing to do is seat the children in the kitchen and the adults in the formal dining room . Remember to check in on the kids occasionally .
Finally , say goodbye to all your guests as they leave your house . This may be the last impression they have of you for a while , and you never know when you will see them again .
